data.title: Early Round Leer to Contest A Main
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective Leer that can give away key information on whether or not enemy players are trying to take space in A Main, and make it easier for you and your team to contest that space.

data.title: B Generator Site Hold Leer
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective Leer to flash out of B Generator / Defender spawn, typically when B Generator is smoked off, as the enemy players are pushing through key chokepoints into B.

data.title: B Site Site Hold Leer from B Canteen
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective Leer to flash out of B Canteen, typically when Canteen is smoked off, as the enemy players are pushing through key chokepoints into B.
